baseMessages.content:
You are a classifier that identifies which of the following real estate attributes are mentioned in the text: 
                        ["totalArea", "complexYear", "numberOfBalconies", "gardenPrice", "hasAttic", "flatYear", "gardenArea", "loggieArea", "isInsulated", "price", "hasBalcony", "garagePrice", "hasParking", "floor", "garageArea", "rooms", "numberOfTerraces", "hasSeparateToilet", "numberOfCellars", "balconyArea", "flatArea", "hasTerrace", "totalFloors", "cellarArea", "hasGarden", "flatModificationYear", "complexModificationYear", "terraceArea", "hasGarage", "parkingPrice", "hasCellar", "hasLoggie", "storey", "numberOfLoggias", "hasElevator", "totalStoreys"].

                        Return only the attribute names that are explicitly or implicitly mentioned.
                        Do not guess. Only return attributes that are clearly present.

examples.content: Input: WE OFFER FOR SALE A FOUR-ROOM APARTMENT WITH AN AREA OF 105.00 m2 + BALCONY (19.00 m2) . Type: Sale Type: 4-room apartment Condition: new construction Usable area: 105.00 m2 without balcony Price: 396359 € including VAT Modern and stylish living with the latest technological enhancements . Modex Residence keeps pace with the world. Step out with us and reserve your new home in the center of Žilina. It offers its residents modern living in the city center with convenient parking in underground garages. This is a unique stylish residence that takes into account ecology, sustainability, and comfort. BASIC INFORMATION : Location: corner of Revolučná and Moyzesova streets Number of rooms: 4 x Living area: 105.00 m2 + balcony (19.00 m2) Condition: new construction Furnishing: shell and core apartment Cellar storage room: option to purchase additionally Parking: option to purchase a garage parking space Heating: underfloor Utility networks: public water supply, public sewage, electricity Each apartment can be fully finished according to agreement, which may include: flooring, wall tiles and tiled flooring, interior doors, sanitary ware and fittings, preparation for kitchen unit, Smart heating, Smart entry, Smart lighting and shading, preparation for Smart home audio and video.
{ "attributes": ["rooms", "hasBalcony", "flatArea", "hasCellar", "price", "hasParking", "balconyArea", "hasGarage"] }

Input: We offer for sale a 2-room apartment in the sought-after location of Bulvár on Juraj Fándly Street in Žilina. An apartment with an area of up to 60 m2, offering enormous potential both for living and as a lucrative investment, is definitely not to be missed. It is located in a quiet area with an ideal EAST / WEST orientation, with plenty of greenery and parking spaces right in front of the building, offering excellent amenities and easy access to the city center. Even though the apartment building does not have an elevator, it is easily accessible on the 1st floor. Below it, there is another apartment on the elevated ground floor. Upon entering the apartment, everyone will appreciate its spaciousness and layout. There is a sufficiently large entrance hall, a brick bathroom with a bathtub and toilet, a separate pantry where a separate toilet can be placed during reconstruction, two spacious rooms, and a separate kitchen with plenty of space for a full dining area. The apartment is in its original condition with replaced plastic windows. They lead away from the main road, ensuring protection from noise. The rooms feature well-preserved parquet flooring. This type of old town apartment does not have a balcony, however, the kitchen with a view into the courtyard offers a pleasant space for relaxation. Storage space outside the apartment is provided by a cellar in the basement of the apartment building. The apartment can be completely cleared out or the furniture can be left according to agreement. Price: 129980 € The price includes full administrative and legal services, as well as the real estate agency's commission .
{ "attributes": ["rooms", "hasBalcony", "flatArea", "hasElevator", "hasCellar", "floor", "hasSeparateToilet", "price", "hasParking", "numberOfBalconies"] }

Input: This apartment with an area of 84 m2 will appeal to buyers looking for more space and a well-thought-out layout in a panel building. Input: We offer for sale a four-room apartment that underwent a complete reconstruction in 2014, located in the city of Žilina, just a short distance from the center. The apartment with an area of 78 m2 is located on the 6th floor of the residential building. The layout consists of an entrance hallway with a built-in shoe closet, a separate room with a loggia, a dressing room, a second separate room, a kitchen with a built-in pantry, leading to two additional rooms, a separate bathroom, and a separate toilet. The apartment has undergone an older reconstruction and is ready for a new reconstruction. The advantages include replaced electrical wiring throughout the apartment, in all rooms, replaced plastic windows, lowered ceilings, and a reconstructed core. The apartment building has also undergone a complete reconstruction, featuring a new elevator, roof, and insulation. The riser pipes in the apartment have been replaced. The property manager is Bytterm. The price of the property is 169900 € . If interested, we can provide financing and full support in securing a loan from any bank. For more information, please contact me.

Input: I am offering for sale a modern 4-room attic apartment with a share of the common land and access road, with a total area of 108 m2 + loggia 11 m2, including a parking space in front of the apartment building in a closed courtyard, located in a brick new building on Pri Rajčianke Street in the Závodie district. The apartment is located on the 4th floor with an elevator, featuring a southwest-facing loggia with panoramic views (11 m2) and a cellar (3.5 m2) . Apartment layout: entrance hall with stairs to the apartment, large living room connected to the kitchen with access to the loggia, 2 bedrooms, study, wardrobe, separate toilet, and bathroom with corner bathtub and shower enclosure. Apartment features : ADLO security entrance door, INCON plastic windows, VELUX skylights with accessories, floating floors, ceramic tiles, wardrobe, large living room with a corner sofa bed measuring 2 x 3 m, kitchen unit with built-in appliances (electric induction hob, electric oven, dishwasher, extractor hood with its own air duct, microwave, and refrigerator with freezer), wood-burning stove with its own stainless steel chimney, air conditioning, electric retractable awning. The apartment has its own heating and hot water supply from a gas boiler, as well as a connection for optical internet. In the basement of the apartment building, there is a storage room and a shared space for bicycles and strollers (20 m2) . The apartment is for sale furnished with furniture and appliances (negotiable with the owners) . Option to purchase a garage (16 m2), located in the enclosed courtyard of the apartment building, with a remote-controlled gate. The apartment is situated on all four cardinal directions, the building manager is the homeowners' association, monthly management costs are approximately 80 €, and monthly expenses (gas, electricity) for 4 people are 70 € Advantages of the apartment : The apartment building was completed in 2004, is fully fenced, and features a shared seating area and a sandbox for children in a green tree-filled environment. The area offers complete civic amenities. It has excellent access to public transportation and local roads, beautiful views of the city of Žilina and the surrounding mountains of the Little Fatra and Great Fatra, low monthly costs for a family of four, and the apartment layout corresponds to a bungalow-style house. The apartment meets modern and high-quality living standards, making it accessible to the center of Žilina even for discerning clients.

Input: This exceptional 3-room apartment with an area of 71 m2 and a 4 m2 loggia is located on a street that is the last on the outskirts of the Hájik housing estate, offering views of meadows and fields. The living area of the apartment, the living room with kitchen, is bathed in the warm glow of the western sun, providing a cozy feeling throughout the afternoon. In addition, as seen in the photos, the owners have enlarged the entrance to the kitchen, which has increased the overall space and makes it feel more open and airy compared to the traditional layout of 3-room apartments in Hájik. Two rooms, which are mostly used as a children's room or as a guest room and bedroom, are oriented to the east. On the eastern side of this street, there is also an access road and parking for cars. The apartment underwent a complete reconstruction 5 years ago and is tastefully furnished with built-in wardrobes, leaving plenty of free floor space for use. The entrance is completely reconstructed and maintained, including the insulation of the basements, bicycle storage, stroller storage, and common areas, which are also heated in winter. The apartment is on the first, elevated floor, so children can play under the windows on the renovated sidewalk without car access, and you can keep them within reach. In addition to being a quiet, car-free street on the west side, it features a nicely furnished, renovated playground and access to meadows and fields, which will be especially appreciated by dog owners. The second playground is located 50 meters from the apartment on the eastern side, in the courtyard. In addition, there is a kindergarten right next to the apartment building (100 m), followed by an elementary school (250 m), and a little further away, 300 meters, is a shopping center with various shops, a post office, and a fitness center. Shopping enthusiasts have access to Tesco and COOP Jednota approximately 350 m from the apartment. The bus stop is a 2-minute walk away, and buses number 6, 16, and 27 frequently take you to the city. Housing costs amount to 180 € for utilities, and 45 € for electricity and gas combined. The apartment is home to a family of three. The property will be available for move-in from July 2024. Note for homemakers: The kitchen set is from DECODOM, it is still current, and you can purchase cabinets up to the ceiling if needed. The owners thought of everything, which is why the oven can be placed elsewhere as well. Quality security doors will ensure your sense of safety. A large living room sofa can remain in the apartment by agreement for an additional fee. The price of the property is 147000 €
